name: pad-ws
tagline: A real time collaborative markdown editor
description: Pad.ws is a self-hosted collaborative Markdown note editor inspired by Etherpad. It supports real-time editing, sharing, and document versioning with a minimalist interface.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple users edit the same Markdown document simultaneously with live cursor tracking and instant synchronization

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Native Markdown support with syntax highlighting and live preview makes it easy to format documents

features.title: Version History
features.description: Automatic version tracking allows you to review changes over time and restore previous document states

features.title: Shareable Links
features.description: Generate unique URLs for each document to share with collaborators, enabling quick access without account

features.title: Minimalist Interface
features.description: Clean, distraction-free editor focused on writing and collaboration without unnecessary UI elements

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download documents in multiple formats including Markdown, HTML, and plain text for use in other

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Start editing immediately without creating accounts, reducing friction for quick collaborative sessions

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Full control over your data with self-hosted deployment ensures documents remain on your infrastructure
